metadata.Title: CVE-2018-16860 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in samba's Heimdal KDC implementation, versions 4.8.x up to, excluding 4.8.12, 4.9.x up to, excluding 4.9.8 and 4.10.x up to, excluding 4.10.3, when used in AD DC mode. A man in the middle attacker could use this flaw to intercept the request to the KDC and replace the user name (principal) in the request with any desired user name (principal) that exists in the KDC effectively obtaining a ticket for that principal.

criterions.comment: heimdal: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
